property.name: comparingField
property.description: Field which will be used to select the records in order to compare them.

property.name: metaField
property.description: Add Field API which will provide additional detail for your search dropdown and it should be one of the fields present in the Field sets.

property.name: comparingImageField
property.description: Add Image field API to which will be shown in search dropdown.

property.name: imageFields
property.description: Comma seperate values of field API which has URL of an image.

property.name: colorFields
property.description: Comma seperates values of field API which has color palattes in them.

property.name: isThirdProductNotAvailable
property.description: Pass true if you only want to compare two products at a time.

property.name: objectAPI
property.description: Object for which data will be fetched.

property.name: fieldSetList
property.description: Comma seperated fieldsets API name for the above objects.
